data.name: Rocket Science Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The complete soundtrack for "Rocket Science". Soundtrack was released in two volumes: The first, titled Volume 1, was released on February 20, 2020; Volume 2 on August 25, 2020,

MP3 format
44100hz sample rate
320 kbps bitrate
Stereo

Total size: 159 mb
Volume 1 soundtrack length: 43 minutes
Volume 2 soundtrack length: 26 minutes

data.short_description: The complete soundtrack to "How do you like it, Elon Musk?"
data.supported_languages: English, Russian, French, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese
